description: This file defines a debounce utility function used to limit the rate at which a function can fire. It exports the debounce function for use in other parts of the project, likely to optimize event handling or API calls.

methods.name: debounce(fn, wait = 200)
methods.description: Creates a debounced version of a function that delays invoking until after a specified wait time has elapsed since the last time it was invoked.
